sn22.111:1.2: “Rupe, bhikkhave, yo chando yo rago ya nandi ya tanha, tam pajahatha.
sn22.111:1.3: Evam tam rupam pahinam bhavissati ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam.
sn22.111:1.7: vinnane yo chando yo rago ya nandi ya tanha, tam pajahatha.
sn22.111:1.8: Evam tam vinnanam pahinam bhavissati ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhamman”ti.
